‎我想他

-Hey. -Yo.
Are you nervous? It's the first time you've been out in quite a while.

translation.en: Concerts don't make me nervous.

That you're leaving the show?

-Okay. -Another one.

Love.

translation.en: This motherfucker!
Hey, look, hey… Look K, man.
I knew he was gonna cost you, I ain't know it was gonna be all that.
translation.zh:
‎我知道得给他点钱
‎但没想到会那么多

translation.en: Let me just talk to him. I know this motherfucker. I'll--
translation.zh:
‎让我跟他聊聊
‎我了解这个王八蛋 我能…

translation.en: I'll work it out.
I got this. I got this. Okay?
Why is it that every time you tell me you got it,
I feel like I get in more trouble?
-You notice that? -Trust me, bro.
translation.zh:
‎-你注意到没？
‎-相信我 弟弟

translation.en: Whenever you say you got it, you never have it.
translation.zh: ‎你每次说能搞定 但每次都搞不定

translation.en: And I asked you, C. I asked you. I said, "Don't fuck me on this one."
translation.zh:
‎我对你就一个请求 大卡
‎我说“这次再也不要辜负我”

translation.en: That's what I said to you. Now, I look up and I'm getting fucked.
translation.zh:
‎我就是这么跟你说的
‎结果你还是辜负了我

translation.en: I'm getting fucked. Why can't you do anything right?
translation.zh: ‎我完蛋了 你怎么什么事都做不好？

translation.en: What's your record, 0 for a 100?
translation.zh:
‎你的记录是什么？
‎100次里一次都没有？

translation.en: As a matter of fact, I know because I got people in LA keeping score,
translation.zh:
‎说实在的 我之所以知道
‎是因为洛杉矶那边有人在帮我记着

translation.en: and they're keeping score with dollars.
With fucking dollars. Because that's what I spend on your ass.
translation.zh:
‎用的可是美元
‎因为我一直在往你身上扔钱

translation.en: -Yo, careful, man. -Careful? Careful for what?
If Friday the 13th were a person, it would be you.
translation.zh:
‎如果13号的周五是一个人
‎那人肯定是你

translation.en: I'm your fucking younger brother. I've been taking care of you my whole life.
translation.zh:
‎我是你弟弟
‎但一辈子一直在为你操心

translation.en: Un-fucking-real. All I've done for you, and this is how you repay me?
translation.zh:
‎真是不可思议 我为你付出那么多
‎你就这么回报我？

translation.en: Man, fuck you with that bullshit.
-Me going pro went south because of you. -Stop with the going pro!
translation.zh:
‎-我没能走上橄榄球职业生涯都怪你
‎-去你的职业生涯吧！

translation.en: Shut up, man! You didn't go pro because you got caught on a corner.
translation.zh:
‎闭嘴！你没成为职业橄榄球员
‎是因为被抓到贩卖毒品

translation.en: Oh, okay.
You're not the only person who got caught and had a chance to rebuild their life.
translation.zh:
‎不只是你遭遇挫折
‎然后有机会重建人生

translation.en: Jay-Z did.
Biggie did it. They somehow went up.
translation.zh:
‎声名狼藉先生也做到了
‎他们东山再起

translation.en: But what did my brother do? Well, he does what he always does.
translation.zh: ‎但我哥哥做了什么？还是老样子

translation.en: My brother somehow found a way to lose.
Because that's what you do, you fucking lose.
translation.zh: ‎因为这就是你做的事 你缴械投降

translation.en: This fucking loser act that you've perfected over the years,
translation.zh: ‎你多年来日益精进的废物技能

translation.en: guess what, it finally rubbed off.
translation.zh: ‎你猜怎么着 终于影响到了我

translation.en: I'm right there with you, but now I got a lot more to lose than just my career.
translation.zh:
‎我此刻虽然跟你在一起
‎但要赔上的不只是自己的事业

translation.en: A whole lot more.
[chuckles] Your bitch-ass is all bold now that the body gone?
translation.zh: ‎尸体刚处理好 你就支棱起来了？

translation.en: "Bitch-ass" now.
Look, if you think I fucked up, then,
translation.zh: ‎听着 如果你觉得我搞砸了

translation.en: you can go ahead and deal with Ari any way you choose.
translation.zh: ‎那你用自己的方式去跟阿里打交道吧

translation.en: But just remember this…
This time, you ain't paying for my fuck-up.
This one is all yours.
Bruh.
-[male voice] Hello. -Hey.
-Hey. What up, Terry? Can you hear me? -Kid, is that you?
translation.zh:
‎-你好 泰瑞 你能听见我说话吗？
‎-基德 是你吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it's me.
What time is it? Are you okay?
Yeah, I'm good, it's, uh… You know.
It's a little late, but I'm straight. Dude, I'm thinking--
translation.zh:
‎现在有点晚 但我就直说了
‎兄弟 我在想…

translation.en: I think it's time that I, um…
I start doing more for my family, man, right?
translation.zh:
‎为自己的家人做更多事了
‎对吧 伙计？

translation.en: Like, mainly… mainly Carlton.
[Terry] You didn't talk to him, did you?
No, we talked. We had a long talk, actually.
translation.zh: ‎不 我们聊过了 其实我们长谈了一次

translation.en: You know, maybe we should get Todd up. Huh?
-No. Don't do that, Terry. -What?
Don't fucking do that, man.
-I didn't call Todd, I called you. -No, I know.
translation.zh:
‎-我没打给托德 而是打给了你
‎-对 我知道

translation.en: Now, what I want you to do is listen.
Okay.
For a change, just listen.
Okay.
I, um…
I just want to set Carlton up one last time.
translation.zh: ‎我想最后一次给卡尔顿一笔钱

translation.en: Okay, all right. How much? When?
I feel like if I'm gonna do it, I just wanna do it right, so…
translation.zh: ‎我想着既然要给 就多给点 所以…

translation.en: you know, I wanna give him like…
I wanna give him, like, 500.
500K at the top of every month.
For the next year.
Kid, do you need me to send the police to your room right now?
translation.zh:
‎基德 你用我现在
‎让警察去你房间吗？

translation.en: -I mean, just gimme a sign. Is he there? -No, Terry. What did I ask you to do?
translation.zh: ‎你给我一个暗示 ‎不用 泰瑞 我刚怎么跟你说的？

translation.en: -I know, but-- -What did I ask you to do?
translation.zh:
‎-我知道 但是…
‎-我刚怎么跟你说的？

translation.en: -Yeah, but-- -I said, for once, do your fucking job.
translation.zh:
‎-没错 可是…
‎-我让你这次好好办事

translation.en: -I understand. -What I asked you to set my brother up.
That means, in the morning, call the fucking bank,
translation.zh: ‎也就是说 明天一大早打给银行

translation.en: tell the bank what I need.
Transfer the money so it goes to Carlton's account,
and then… and then, moving forward,
do the same thing at the top of the month so it goes down for the--
translation.zh: ‎每个月的第一天给他打钱 一直持续…

translation.en: Okay. Kid, you just can't give somebody that kind of money.
translation.zh:
‎好的 基德
‎你不能随便给其他人转这么多钱

translation.en: You can't.
You have to report something like this, declare it.
translation.zh: ‎这种事得备案 你得申报

translation.en: What are you talking about? When--? Since when?
translation.zh:
‎你在说什么？什么时候…
‎什么时候开始的？

translation.en: I didn't-- Name another time when I've had to do it.
translation.zh:
‎我之前…你跟我说说
‎之前哪次用这么做了

translation.en: It's the law. We get audited every year for every dime you spend.
translation.zh:
‎这是法律 你花的每一分钱
‎每年都会受到审计

translation.en: -[Kid sighs] -Kid, I've been doing this a long time.
translation.zh: ‎基德 我做这一行很久了

translation.en: You give someone that kind of money, it doesn't buy you what you think.
translation.zh: ‎你给别人那么多钱 只会事与愿违

translation.en: It's a green light, and they keep coming back for more.
translation.zh:
‎这等于是给他们亮绿灯
‎他们会不停地回来找你要钱

translation.en: That kind of money, it's not one last time.
translation.zh: ‎给这种钱…就不会有停的时候

translation.en: -I hear you. -Okay.
-I just need to think, I need to, um... -Okay.
I need to think about, you know, the whole thing.
-So just hold off. -Yeah, take your time.
-Just hold off. Don't do shit. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-你先暂停 什么都不要做
‎-知道了

translation.en: -Till I tell you to do it. -Okay. You got it.
translation.zh:
‎-我会告诉你下一步怎么做
‎-没问题

translation.en: My advice is to reopen the restaurant,
you run the money through there, and, boom, you declare it.
translation.zh: ‎把钱投到餐厅 然后进行申报

translation.en: Celebrities, they always go stupid with their money in restaurants, it's simple.
translation.zh: ‎名人一向投资餐厅会失败 很简单

translation.en: So, how are we gonna play it?
translation.zh: ‎所以 你打算怎么给我钱？

translation.en: I'll get you the money.
I mean, but if you want me to give you six mil,
translation.zh: ‎我是说 如果你想找我要六百万

translation.en: you gotta do better than telling me it's all good.
translation.zh: ‎就不止是告诉我一切都好这么简单了

translation.en: How may I ease your mind?
Well, how do I know it's not coming back on me?
translation.zh: ‎我怎么知道你不会把这件事说出去？

translation.en: How do I know you haven't talked to the world? Who else knows you're here?
translation.zh:
‎我怎么知道你没告诉别人？
‎还有谁知道你在这里？

translation.en: Who knows about this, knows about me?
-I have none of these answers. -[Ari] Nobody.
translation.zh:
‎-这些我都不知道答案
‎-没有谁

translation.en: Except your brother.
-You're just gonna have to trust me. -No.
No, that's not gonna fucking fly, man.
You gotta do a much better job of selling me than that, Ari.
translation.zh: ‎除了让我信你的话 你还得做更多

translation.en: Okay, you gotta put my mind at ease.
If you don't wanna put my mind at ease, then maybe I keep the money.
translation.zh: ‎如果你不想让我安心 那我就留着钱

translation.en: I'll take my chances with the cops.
Me and you may end up sharing a cell, for all I know.
translation.zh: ‎说不定咱俩会住一间牢房呢

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, maybe we do.
I'm sorry, man. You're just not a very good actor.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 伙计 你演技不太行

translation.en: But I'll play with you, Hollywood. All right? I'll play. How's this?
translation.zh:
‎但我愿意配合你 好莱坞巨星
‎好吗？我配合你 不如这样吧

translation.en: In my line of work, someone finds out I got my hooks into something fat,
translation.zh:
‎干我们这行的
‎如果有人知道我掌握了财富秘籍

translation.en: they want a piece of that action.
And I don't want that.
When you find gold, you don't tell everyone where it's buried, right?
translation.zh:
‎你要是找到了金矿
‎肯定不会告诉别人地点 对吧？

translation.en: You keep it all to yourself.
And you, my friend, I am going to keep all to myself.
translation.zh: ‎而你 我的朋友 我会把一切守口如瓶

translation.en: What about fucking Daphne?
How are you so certain that the cops won't find her body on their own?
translation.zh:
‎你怎么如此确定
‎警察绝不会找到她的尸体？

translation.en: Because it's someplace safe where nobody will find it.
translation.zh:
‎因为它在一个不会有人找到的
‎安全之地

translation.en: How do I know that in a month you don't go and jack the price up on me?
translation.zh:
‎我怎么知道一个月后
‎你不会突然增大价码？

translation.en: The minute I cash the first check, I am your partner.
translation.zh:
‎只要我第一张支票兑现
‎我们就是搭档了

translation.en: -I share the same risk. -You're my partner?
translation.zh:
‎-我跟你担同样的风险
‎-你是我的搭档？

translation.en: Okay, so I guess that means I gotta trust you, right?
translation.zh:
‎好吧 所以我想这说明
‎我得信任你 对吧？

translation.en: We're gonna do the, um… we're gonna do the restaurant thing.
Good.
I'll put it in you and Carlton's name. Y'all take it from there.
translation.zh:
‎我会把餐厅记在你和卡尔顿的名下
‎你从那里拿钱

translation.en: After that, I don't wanna talk to you no more. I don't wanna see your face.
translation.zh:
‎然后我再也不想跟你说话
‎我再也不想见到你

translation.en: I don't wanna be associated with you anymore.
I don't know if I can do that, I mean,
I kinda thought maybe I'd be an… and actor,
and maybe you could give me a role in one of your movies.
translation.zh:
‎或许你可以在电影里
‎给我安排一个角色

translation.en: You just think you can shit on me, don't you?
You can shit all over me because I need your fucking help, is that what you think?
translation.zh:
‎你可以随便摆布我
‎因为我需要你帮忙 你这么想吗？

translation.en: Kid, just take a fucking shower.
Have a good shit. Stop waking up with dead girls in your bed,
translation.zh:
‎好好拉个屎 别再醒来发现自己床上
‎有死去的女孩

translation.en: and this will go away.
You won't have to do this again. Can we get on with it?
How'd you get the body out of here?
It's a hotel, there's cameras everywhere, how'd you do it?
translation.zh:
‎这里酒店 到处是摄像头
‎你怎么做到的？

translation.en: I had to break some bones.
translation.zh: ‎我迫不得已敲碎了几根骨头

translation.en: Then I folded her up, into a little ball,
and I stuffed her into the cart.
We rolled that cart to the service elevator.
Fourth floor cameras are out, so we went to the fourth floor and then…
translation.zh:
‎四楼的摄像头坏了
‎所以我们去了那里 然后…

translation.en: the trash chute's on the fourth floor, it leads down to the Cuthbert Street Dumpster.
translation.zh:
‎垃圾槽在四楼
‎直接连着卡斯伯特街道的垃圾桶

translation.en: You see, I used to have a contract with this place, this hotel. So…
translation.zh:
‎是这样 我之前跟这酒店
‎签过合同 所以…

translation.en: And then I wrapped her in a tarp,
and your brother and I, we put her in the trunk of a car,
translation.zh: ‎你和我哥哥 我们把她装进后备箱

translation.en: and we went away.
Okay.
But I got a question for you now.
How does it feel to be so rich?
You're unreal, man.
It's complicated.
[Ari] Well, I've got time.
[Kid] Bet you fucking do.
Everything I got, I earned. That's all me.
translation.zh:
‎我所有的一切都是努力争取来的
‎全靠自己的努力

translation.en: I never had my hand out, I never took something that wasn't mine.
translation.zh:
‎我从未向别人伸过手
‎拿过不属于自己的东西

translation.en: I never hurt anybody.
I took a lot of people with me.
A whole lot of fucking people. And all those people rely on me now.
translation.zh: ‎很多人 他们现在都指着我

translation.en: And now you rely on me.
Being rich ain't that simple, Ari.
translation.zh: ‎有钱人的生活没那么简单 阿里

translation.en: Just like you getting that dead body out of here, it's a lot of twists and turns.
translation.zh:
‎就像你把那具尸体弄出去
‎会出现各种反转和波折

translation.en: See, the funny thing about making money, the more you make, the more you realize
translation.zh:
‎关于赚钱 有意思的是
‎你赚得越多 就越明白

translation.en: the money is secondary to the decisions you make.
Sorry. You really believe that shit, right? Like…
No, I'm asking because I saw you on TV, you were doing all that motivational shit.
translation.zh:
‎我之所以这么问 是因为看到
‎你在电视上各种励志

translation.en: And I thought it was just a bunch of crap, a gimmick,
translation.zh: ‎我还以为你就是说说而已 搞个噱头

translation.en: but you're standing here telling me, and you actually believe it.
translation.zh: ‎但你站在这里告诉我你信那套

translation.en: -I do. -All right.
When people run up on me and talk shit and think they can get away with it,
translation.zh: ‎所以有人唬我 以为能蒙混过关时

translation.en: well, that's why that pisses me off. It annoys me.
translation.zh: ‎这就是让我生气的原因 这让我烦心

translation.en: It annoys the fuck out of me. Because of what I believe, well…
translation.zh: ‎让我烦到不行 因为我的信仰…

translation.en: That's the reason these same people can't take advantage.
translation.zh: ‎所以这些人占不到我的便宜

translation.en: Will you just write the fucking check?
I heard you.
Write the fucking check.
It's so easy to take too. Right?
Everybody can just fucking take from me.
-Why not? It's so fucking easy for me too. -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: ‎有何不可呢？毕竟我来钱这么容易

translation.en: 'Cause everybody else assumes that it's easy,
but the difference between you and everybody else is that you…
you made a mistake.
You told me how to get the fucking body out!
translation.zh: ‎你告诉了我怎么把尸体弄出去！

translation.en: You fucker!
Fuck you!
-[choking] -Fuck you!
Fuck you!
Fuck you! Huh?
You wanna fucking take from me?
You wanna fucking take from me?
Fuck you.
Fuck you.
Get the fuck off me.
What's up? What you doing up? It's 2:00 a.m. there.
translation.zh:
‎什么事？你怎么还没睡？
‎那边都凌晨2点了

translation.en: Patrick spent the night, and we watched a scary movie.
translation.zh:
‎帕特里克在家里过夜
‎我们看来一部恐怖片

translation.en: You're not supposed to watch scary movies.
I know, but I did.
Patrick's asleep, and now I'm afraid.
translation.zh: ‎帕特里克睡着了 但我好害怕

translation.en: You ain't gotta be afraid, man.
I told you that. Plus, the monsters, they…
translation.zh: ‎我跟你说过 而且那些怪兽 它们…

translation.en: The monsters only come after the people that they know are scared.
Are you having fun?
No.
No, man, I'm not having fun.
Why don't you go to bed, okay? I'll call you in the morning.
translation.zh: ‎你快去睡觉吧 好吗？我明早打给你

translation.en: Okay. Well, I love you.
I miss you.
-I miss you too. -[emotionally] Mm…
Go to bed, Dad.
What the fuck did you do?
I decided that I didn't wanna pay six million dollars.
translation.zh: ‎我决定不给他那六百万美元

translation.en: ♪ What do we have here now? Do you wanna ride or die? ♪ ♪ La la-da-la la la la la ♪
